Properties.DisplayName: ||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power
Properties.Text:
In this quest, the player/writer sets out to find a mythical narrative bible known as the Ehhh Aye*. Whoever wields the tome can use simple verbal prompts to generate narrative content guaranteed to make their game score 100% on Metacritic! 

Quest Outline: https://www.notion.so/chadbriggs/External-Lore-Page-Example-3c459c4d0ac842c99885f9059000c925?pvs=4



*See what I did there? Don't worry, there is a lot more where that came from! Hang on to yer knickers!

The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump over me.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Why won't the ritual of compiling complete? WHY??

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Ugh, how long have I been crunching? I need a mental health day.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: "The blade needs to cut through 60 orcs per second. How hard can it be?"

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004151
Properties.Text: They send a writer my way? Ha! The narrative in this game is mid at best.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Finished! A fine blade indeed! Here, give it a whack on that block of Kew Eh over there. I bet you can split it in half with ease!

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004149
Properties.Text: Great! How long will that take?

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Whoops. Well... that's what happens when you ask for early access to The Code.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Sure, if you want to stick around and wait for another build.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: About a week.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004149
Properties.Text: What?? I can't wait that long! The Jeeerah Beast is sprinting towards the kingdom and will destroy us all!

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004149
Properties.Text: Can you make another???

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: *shrugs* That's what happens when you have me grind 300 gig stones into a build.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Hmmm... you could seek out the Toxic Troll in the Lost Forest. It's rumoured to possess the legendary Mace of Bug Squashing.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Smear some jerky strips on those gauntlets of yours and you might stand a chance. Good luck kid!

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004149
Properties.Text: There has to be another way!

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: BUT... you won't win a fight against that thing without a serious upgrade. Seek out the Sacred Tree of Holy Jerky!

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004151
Properties.Text: LOL! Those gauntlets are so basic bro!

Properties.Speaker: 0x0000000000000000
Properties.Text: Bark 01

Properties.Speaker: 0x0000000000000000
Properties.Text: Bark 02

Properties.Speaker: 0x0000000000000000
Properties.Text: The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumped.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0000000000000000
Properties.Text: The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump over me.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004149
Properties.Text: Greetings Devil Opper! I seek a boon from you!

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Let me guess, you want The Code weeks ahead of schedule?

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004149
Properties.Text: Uhh... yes?

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Then piss off. I'm busy.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004149
Properties.Text: Noooo... nooo... not me. Of course not.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Of course you do. *sigh* Go fetch the bucket of bits over there and I'll grant you early access to The Code.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: What are you, an idiot? I'm a dwarf! I'm like 4 foot 5 in heels! Go get the bucket already!

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004149
Properties.Text: My friend, you are a giant among men!

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004149
Properties.Text: I do! I'll have you know it ONLY took me mere seconds to walk across the room and find it, snatching it with supreme confidence.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Well? Do you have my bucket of bits?

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004149
Properties.Text: Can you give me some more details on the bucket? Is it say... bigger than a breadbox?

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Ugh.... I can't even...

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: It was the only bucket on the shelf you imbecile! Just give it to me!

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: Stop yapping and test The Code already!!

Properties.Speaker: 0x0100000600004145
Properties.Text: I've helped you all I can, piss off.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0000000000000000
Properties.Text: The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumped.

Properties.Speaker: 0x0000000000000000
Properties.Text: The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump over me.

Properties.Speaker: 0x01000006000045C2
Properties.Text: Looks like I need to pick an option here.

Properties.Speaker: 0x01000006000045C2
Properties.Text: I demand to talk about Option 01!

Properties.Speaker: 0x01000006000045C2
Properties.Text: Tell me about Option 02 immediately, you pompous bucket of bolts!

Properties.Speaker: 0x01000006000045C2
Properties.Text: Now that I know about option 01, it is CLEARLY obvious that you are hiding the location of the secret rebel base!

Properties.Speaker: 0x01000006000045C6
Properties.Text: Option 01 is peachy keen!

Properties.Speaker: 0x01000006000045C6
Properties.Text: I would LOVE to help you with that, but as a simple query unit, I do not possess sufficient CPU cycles for your request.

Properties.Speaker: 0x01000006000045C2
Properties.Text: Whoops, forgot I had a pizza in the oven! Gotta to go take that out. Byyyyyeee!

Properties.Speaker: 0x01000006000045C6
Properties.Text: Gee whiz, this nesting stuff is neat!

Properties.Speaker: 0x01000006000045C6
Properties.Text: Oh boy! I've reached the end!

Properties.DisplayName: //HUB - Used to in flow as node for  ...
Properties.Expression: //HUB - Used to in flow as node for jumping back to start of branching choices when needed.

//COMBAT - Combat Instruction Node - Indicates combat

//CRAFTING - Smear the Holy Jerky on your gauntlets.

//CRAFTING - Crafting Instruction Node - Indicates Crafting actions

//ACTION - Pick up bucket of bits

TestFlowVariables.HasBucket=true;

//ACTION - Search for Holy Jerky Bits

TestFlowVariables.HasHolyJerky=true;
//ACTION - Player picks up the Mace of Bug Squashing

//ACTION - Gives bucket to Devil Opper.

TestFlowVariables.HasBucket=false;

//ACTION - Takes The Code

TestFlowVariables.HasSword=true;

Properties.DisplayName: //ACTION - Swing sword at the Kew Eh ...
Properties.Expression: //ACTION - Swing sword at the Kew Eh block.
//ACTION - Action Instruction Node - Indicates generic interaction performed by the player. (Pick up the sword, drink the potion, etc)
//TRAVEL - The PerForge
//TRAVEL - The Lost Forest
//TRAVEL - The Troll Bridge
//TRAVEL - The Lost Forest
//TRAVEL - The Lost Forest
//TRAVEL - TEMP LOCATION 01
//TRAVEL - TEMP LOCATION 02
//TRAVEL - TEMP LOCATION 03
//TRAVEL - TEMP LOCATION 04
//TRAVEL - Travel Instruction Node - Indicates travel choice

Properties.DisplayName: //EVENT - A Toxic Troll climbs out f ...
Properties.Expression: //EVENT - A Toxic Troll climbs out from under a bridge that spans a small stream. It snarls and paces back and forth on the bridge.
//EVENT - The troll thrusts a slimy, gruesome finger at the player and dozens of tiny blue birds swarm and attack.

Properties.DisplayName: //EVENT - As the Troll dies, his bod ...
Properties.Expression: //EVENT - As the Troll dies, his body disentegrates into a cloud of magical ash, leaving the Mace of Bug Squashing behind.

//EVENT - Devil Opper plunges The half finished Code into the bucket of bits. Swirling lights and energy fly out of the bucket, the player recoiling. The Devil Opper pulls out a fully formed Code. He hands it to the player.

//EVENT - The player swings a mighty blow and connects with the block. The sword shatters in to pieces.

TestFlowVariables.HasSword=false;
//EVENT - Indicates a specific animation or event. (A barrel explodes, a NPC jumps out from behind a door, a strange glow appears in the sky, etc, etc)

//JOURNAL_QUEST_000
//(Journal content goes here.)

In Engine: 2 lines (70 char per line)

In Articy: 4 lines - 141 char

Articy Default Box Size

The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumped.

Use Dialogue Fragment Dropdown to pick colored dialogue type OR copy and paste from samples at right.

Color Code

LIGHT BLUE- Interactive Dialogue using Conversation UI

YELLOW - Dialogue over the heads of characters in Exploration Mode, not interactive

Refer To Custom Player Name Example (In Engine)

Hello friend, I am [Session.PlayerName].
CHARACTER BARKS

Quest Starting points use brown flow node below. Quest Descriptions should be inside the instruction flow node and be no longer than 200-400 characters.

Activating objectives in quests are done using the blue node below. The quest log line (one short sentence) goes right after the quest number/objective number. Additional notes and variable changes, such as toggling waypoints can be put below the logline.
A toxic beast that has crawled off the Web of Inter. A swarm of tiny blue birds flock around him and attack at his command.
